      • continuedFraction

        public static int continuedFraction(double x,
                                    int a,
                                    int n)
        Continued fraction expansion. A continued fraction is the representation of a real number by a sequence (possible infinite) of integers: [x0, x1, x2....xn} = x0 +( 1/ x1+ (1/x2 + (1/ .......1/xn))) = p/q
        Parameters:
        x - the x
        a - the a
        n - the n
        Returns:
        the int
